data.convo: Do you love me ? I ’ m very fond of you . Yes , but do you love me ? Why ? You mean a lot to me . Why didn ’ t you answer my question ? What question ? Do you love me ? Come on , I ’ m eager to hear . You know that I care for you . I---I ’ m proud of you . Don ’ t cherish your words , dear . I---I don ’ t feel like saying it
